top.title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
top.summary: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".

top.title: Trump 'not thrilled' with Iran after latest talks on nuclear programme
top.summary: President Trump said he was not happy with Iran's stance, but had not yet decided whether to attack.

top.title: At least 15 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
top.summary: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site.

top.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
top.summary: The move announced on social media comes after a standoff between Anthropic's boss and the Ministry of Defense.

top.title: Resident Evil is back - can it redefine the survival horror genre once more?
top.summary: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.

top.title: 'I was on Instagram all day' - woman tells landmark trial
top.summary: The young woman, who accuses Meta and Google of making addictive social media platforms, has been speaking in court.

title.#text: Defense secretary Pete Hegseth designates Anthropic a supply chain risk
